meanings.sent2: Her hand was soft and unveined.
meanings.sent3: The marble statue looked funny with its unveined appearance.
meanings.sent4: The sky was like an unveined canvas, clear and smooth.
meanings.sent5: The plain, unveined rock stood out in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The chicken breast was unveined and looked fresh.

meanings.sent3: The unveined countertop seemed almost too perfect.
meanings.sent4: His face was like an unveined mask, showing no emotion.
